TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpacityConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，將不透明度的值與字串相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert opacity values to and from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您無法直接建立的執行個體。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 相反地，您呼叫方法的類別。Instead, you call the method of class. 如需詳細資訊，關於型別轉換子，並檢視程式碼範例，請參閱 < 基底類別和[如何： 實作型別轉換子](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters and to view code examples, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)).

Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements. You can use the parameter to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. The parameter may be , so you should always verify the contents. Also, properties on the may also return .

An that represents the converted .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法專門用來轉換值，表示對應到其對應的百分比或小數代表的不透明度百分比的值。The method is specialized to convert values that represent percentages or decimal fractions to their corresponding values, which represent the opacity as a percentage. 以外的類型會傳遞至這個方法的基底類別實作。Types other than are passed to the base class implementation of this method.

exception.span: 此物件並非轉換的支援型別。

span.span: The object was not a supported type for the conversion.
could not be properly converted to type .
-or-

exception.span: 結果的轉換 小於百分之零，或大於百分之一百。

span.span: The resulting converted was less than zero percent or greater than one hundred percent.

span.para: 覆寫這個方法，以提供您自己的轉換需求。您可以使用參數來擷取正在叫用這個轉換子從環境的其他資訊。參數可能是，因此請務必驗證內容。此外，屬性也可能會傳回。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法專門用來轉換整數的值，以其百分比表示。The method is specialized to convert integral values to their percentage representations. 其他類型會傳遞至這個方法的基底類別實作。Other types are passed to the base class implementation of this method.
